misalignments.reasoning: Spec requires error response format with nested structure {error: {code, message}}, and clients should display the message property. However, client-side code incorrectly accesses data.error instead of data.error.message, which would display '[object Object]' instead of the human-readable error message
Spec defines MISSING_FIELDS as the error code for 'Required fields missing', but the login endpoint uses MISSING_CREDENTIALS when email/password fields are missing
